tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    user_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    user_age INT,
    prefered_language VARCHAR(20),
    home_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    language_preference VARCHAR(50),
    theme_preference VARCHAR(50),
    voice_preference VARCHAR(50),
    timezone VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
 preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 language VARCHAR(10),
 theme VARCHAR(20),
 timezone VARCHAR(30)
);

CREATE TABLE voice_assistant_settings (
 setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 wake_word VARCHAR(20),
 volume INT,
 voice_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id INT,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    PRIMARY KEY(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
    user_id INT,
    assistant_language VARCHAR(50),
    home_theme VARCHAR(50),
    notification_settings BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserDevices (
    device_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserVoiceCommands (
    command_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    voice_command VARCHAR(255),
    date_created TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY(command_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserActivityLogs (
    log_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    activity_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY(log_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);
